scripts.fetch-assets: curl -L https://github.com/comunica/comunica-performance-assets/raw/master/watdiv-10.zip?download= > watdiv-10.zip && unzip watdiv-10.zip -d generated/ && rm watdiv-10.zip
scripts.performance: docker pull comunica/query-sparql-file:latest && jbr prepare && jbr run && psbr tex query combinations/combination_*/output --svg --logY --overrideCombinationLabels Current,Previous
scripts.performance:ci: npm run fetch-assets && jbr prepare && jbr run -c 0
